channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google Chrome Password Manager Compromised By New AI Code Attack
item.description: Credential-stealing malware successfully targeting the Google Chrome password manager has been created by hackers using AI.

item.title: FBI Warns iPhone And Android Users—Hang Up Now, Use This Code
item.description: Security experts, including the FBI, have warned all smartphone users to hang up and create a secret code in the face of ongoing attacks. Here's why.
